advancement.plus.root.title: Advancement Plus
advancement.plus.all_the_stones.title: All The Stones
advancement.plus.all_the_stones.desc: Collect all types of stones. Infested stones are excluded
advancement.plus.happy_new_year.title: Happy New Year ??
advancement.plus.all_the_logs.title: All The Logs
advancement.plus.all_the_logs.desc: Collect all types of log wood
advancement.plus.all_the_saplings.title: All The Saplings
advancement.plus.all_diamond_tools.title: All The Diamonds
advancement.plus.all_diamond_tools.desc: Obtains all the diamond tools, armor, horse armor
advancement.plus.all_netherite_tools.des: Obtains all the netherite tools, armor
advancement.plus.all_the_biomes.title: All The Biomes
advancement.plus.all_the_biomes.desc: Go to every single biomes in Overworld, Nether and The End
advancement.plus.truly_hny.title: Truly Happy New Year
advancement.plus.truly_hny.desc: Craft a Firework with any dye, combine it with paper and gunpowder
advancement.plus.workbench.title: Benchmaking
advancement.plus.workbench.desc: When Crafting Table is a root of a tree
advancement.plus.hot_topic.title: Hot Topic
advancement.plus.hot_topic.desc: Craft Furnace. This one looks familiar
advancement.plus.pickaxe_from_nether.des: Upgrade Diamond Pickaxe to netherite Pickaxe in Smithing Table
advancement.plus.i_am_hungry.title: I Am Hungry ! Fast !
advancement.plus.i_am_hungry.desc: Craft Smoker for double the cooking food speed
advancement.plus.i_need_iron.title: I Need Iron! Hurry Up !!
advancement.plus.i_need_iron.desc: Craft Blast Furnace for double the ore processing speed! This isn't Immersive Engineering !
advancement.plus.shiny_metal.title: Shiny Metal
advancement.plus.shiny_metal.desc: Obtain Gold Ore and smelt it into Gold Ingot
advancement.plus.lapis.title: Power Crystal
advancement.plus.blue_money.title: Green Money
advancement.plus.blue_money.desc: Obtain Emerald in mountainous biomes, useful for trading !
advancement.plus.diamond_man.title: Diamond Man
advancement.plus.diamond_man.desc: Obtain full set of Diamond Armor
advancement.plus.gold_apple.title: Shiny Apple
advancement.plus.notchaple.title: NOT-CHAP-PLE
advancement.plus.seven_sea.title: Sail The Seven Sea
advancement.plus.seven_sea.desc: Go to all the ocean biomes
advancement.plus.egypt_pyramid.title: Egypt Pyramid
advancement.plus.egypt_pyramid.desc: Find Desert Pyramid for some good loots! Just don't jump down from the center
advancement.plus.outpost.title: Where Pillager Lives
advancement.plus.silky_pickaxe.title: Silky Tool
advancement.plus.silky_pickaxe.desc: Enchant any type of tools to Silk Touch
advancement.plus.lucky_pickaxe.title: Fortunate Pickaxe
advancement.plus.lucky_pickaxe.desc: Enchant any tier of pickaxe / axe to Fortune
advancement.plus.hard_to_breaking.title: Hark From Breaking
advancement.plus.hard_to_breaking.desc: Enchant any type of tools to Unbreaking
advancement.plus.mending_pickaxe.title: Magic Anvil
advancement.plus.mending_pickaxe.desc: Enchant any type of tools to Mending
advancement.plus.sharpness_sword.title: Sharpness Corner
advancement.plus.sharpness_sword.desc: Enchant any tier of sword / axe to Sharpness
advancement.plus.withering_sword.title: Witherite !!
advancement.plus.withering_sword.desc: Enchant any tier of sword / axe to Smite
advancement.plus.sharp_spikes.title: Sharp Spikes
advancement.plus.titanic.title: Titanic... But Smaller One
advancement.plus.who_is_raider_now.title: Who Is Raider Now ?!
advancement.plus.who_is_raider_now.desc: Loot the chest in Pillager Outpost. This can be obtain by one person per outpost
advancement.plus.i_am_pirate.title: I Am Pirate!
advancement.plus.i_am_pirate.desc: Loot the Buried Treasure. This can be obtain by one person. Other people have to find another
advancement.plus.to_mineshaft.title: Mine In The Dark
advancement.plus.loot_mineshaft.title: Chest Minecart ?
advancement.plus.loot_mineshaft.desc: Loot Chest Minecart in Abandoned Mineshaft. This can be obtain by one person. Other people have to find another
advancement.plus.yes_im_the_raider.title: Yes! I Am The Raider
advancement.plus.yes_im_the_raider.desc: Loot some thing in Woodland Mansion. This can be obtain by one person. Other people have to find another
advancement.plus.tomb_raider.title: Tomb Raider
advancement.plus.tomb_raided.title: Tomb Raided
advancement.plus.tomb_raided.desc: Loot a Chest or Dispenser in Jungle Temple. This can be obtain by one person. Other people have to find another
advancement.plus.shocking_powder.title: Shocking Powder
advancement.plus.isnt_this_map.title: Where is this map come from ?
advancement.plus.isnt_this_map.desc: Open a chest in Shipwreck with Treasure Map in it. This can be obtain by one person. Other people have to find another
advancement.plus.i_am_rich.title: I am rich !
advancement.plus.i_am_rich.desc: Open a chest in Shipwreck with rare resources in it. This can be obtain by one person. Other people have to find another
